comments.body:
Verified fixed, was able to see the border radius for the progress bar. 
*Environment* 
{code:java}
Phone: Lumia 640 LTE
Software : Windows phone 8.1 update 2 
Operating System Name: Windows 10 Pro
Version: 1607
OS Build: 14393.447
Node.js Version:4.4.4
